A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved it\, the story was good\, the acting was great\, the effects and soundtrack just as good as ever. The film has a couple flaws and I can see where most old fans and purists are disappointed in seeing something out of the norm for the Star Wars formula\, but that's exactly why I liked it\, it wasn't predictable nor cliché and the plot twists were great. The only aspect I truly didn't like was how there was no backstory or development of Snoke at all. I also wasn't a fan of the Finn/Rose subplot but I didn't hate it. The rest was great.
